creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
The method importSubtree() is mainly used for copy and move operations on the
sitetree. The use of importSubtree does not take advantage of capabilites of the
underlying repository. Thus, importSubtree is set to deprecated and the use of
the new methods copy() and move() is encouraged which allow a much more
efficient implementation of copy and move operations based on the feature set of
the repository. Some ant tasks are modified to make use of the new methods.

The method removeNode() returns a reference to the node removed. This reference
is invalid if the node is physically deleted in the repository. A new method
deleteNode() is introduced that does not return a value. removeNode is set to
deprecated. Some ant task are modified to use the new method.

Created attachment 14637
Updated SiteTree interface with necessary source modifications.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 14638
Updated SiteTree interface with necessary source modifications.

Created attachment 14642
Updated SiteTree interface. Synchronized DOM access.

Additionally synchronized all access to DOM from SiteTreeNodeImpl. Deprecated
SiteTreeNodeImpl.removeChildren() because it returns invalid children. Added
method deleteChildren() as replacement.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 14661
Updated SiteTree interface. Synchronized DOM access.

Improved locking in case of concurrent inter-sitetree move and copy operations.
